result.eng: I got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.eng: People started getting off the train.

result.eng: He knew his health was getting worse.

result.eng: The famine in Sudan is getting worse.

result.eng: It is getting better all the time.

result.eng: My wife [who is expecting a child] is getting along well this time.

result.eng: Sundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.

result.ponchtml: dé doṁnaiġ bím ag obair - ag déanaṁ réiḋ don tseaċtain úrSundays, I work - getting ready for the new week.

result.eng: He almost collapsed from the view he was getting.
